mapper.sql: product_category_id AS productCategoryId, product_id AS productId, category_id AS categoryId, create_time AS createTime, create_by AS createBy
mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id AS productId, product_number AS productNumber, name, show_price AS showPrice, introduce, pic_img AS picImg, comment_number AS commentNumber, label_name AS labelName FROM os_product_category c LEFT JOIN os_product p ON c.product_id = p.product_id LEFT JOIN os_product_attribute a ON a.product_id = p.product_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT label_id, label_name FROM os_label WHERE status = #{status} ) l ON p.label_id = l.label_id WHERE c.category_id = #{categoryId} AND p.show_in_shelve = #{status} AND p.show_in_hot = #{showInHot} ORDER BY rand() LIMIT ${showNumber}

SELECT comment_id AS commentId, user_name AS userName, content FROM os_product_category p LEFT JOIN os_comment c ON c.product_id = p.product_id WHERE p.product_id = #{productId} AND c.status = #{status} AND type = #{type} ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1
